lyrics:
19 contributorsu smile lyricsverse 1
id wait on you forever and a day
hand and foot
your world is my world yeah
aint no way youre ever gon get any less than you should

chorus
cause baby
you smile i smile oh
cause whenever you smile i smile
hey hey hey

verse 2
your lips my biggest weakness
shouldnt have let you know
im always gonna do what they say hey
if you need me ill come running from a thousand miles away

chorus
when you smile i smile
oh woah
you smile i smile hey

verse 3
baby take my open heart and all it offers
cause this is as unconditional as itll ever get
you aint seen nothing yet
i wont ever hesitate to give you more
you might also likechorus
cause baby you smile i smile whoa
you smile i smile hey hey hey
you smile i smile i smile i smile i smile

bridge
baby you wont ever want for nothing
you are my ends and my means now
with you theres no in between im all in
cause my cards are on the table and im willing and im able
but i fold to your wish cause its my command hey hey hey

chorus
you smile i smile whoa
you smile i smile hey hey hey
you smile i smile i smile i smile i smile
you smile i smile oh

you smile i smile
you smile i smile7embed
